rComments: Horrible. All she does is to teach grammar in English. Not effective at all!

She is the best prof I had in my first year, even though this couse was my elective. Attend her classes and study a day before midterm and you'll pass with a 4.0 Study environment is so effective. And yeah she will teach Despacito :)

She made Spanish incredibly easy to learn and follow along. Like another poster said, she does tend to pick on people who don't participate. She's incredibly clear with her explanations and examples and does tons of exercises to make sure you understand everything to the T.  She also gives you a solid breakdown of what will and won't be on the test

The course itself is group work heavy through no fault of Veronika; its standard for all SPA100 classes regardless of prof. Same goes for tests and quizzes. She makes the material clear and relates it to English for better comprehension. I enjoy the use of learning through songs like Enrique Iglesias.

Greatest TA I've ever had. Amazing energy and always wears a smile. Genuinely cares about all her students and wants to see everyone succeed. She will go the extra mile to see that you understand concepts. Every TA should come watch her perform and take notes.

I loved Veronika! She learned everyone's names! but if you don't participate, she'll call you out to answer. She was so funny and passionate! She also made sure we were super prepared to tests & exams. There is A LOT do for this class: online assignments, participation, quizzes etc but I enjoyed it a lot! Make sure you go to class & tutorial!!!
